name: Solitaire Resort - Card Game
description:
Discover Solitaire Resort, a majestic and relaxing Tripeaks solitaire experience. Enjoy the classic card game from the billowing sanctuary of your private beachfront cabana. Solve solitaire puzzles from the world’s most inviting beaches. Experience the world’s most idyllic destinations while solving relaxing puzzles to soothe your mind. An oasis of tranquility awaits you.

- Solve relaxing Solitaire puzzles
- Visit the world’s exotic beaches
- Enjoy soothing beachfront views
- Re-discover the classic solitaire card game
- Earn VIP Rewards every time you play

Solitaire Resort is a classic Tripeaks card game featuring an immersive Island getaway. Download it now, tranquility awaits.
